item.description:
September marks Back to School season.
This next workshop I would like to focus on Back to YOU.

By making cards to honor each aspect of your being, you learn to understand yourself better. It's an amazing process I hope to share and explore with you.

Take some to time to be with like-minded women playing with scissors, glue and powerful images.

No artistic ability necessary.
All supplies provided.

Please RSVP to get an accurate count.
RSVP at website to put deposit, saving your spot.

Price is $50 but Meetup Members get $5.00 off. Bring a Friend & you get another $10 off!

group.name: Above and Beyond Boston SoulCollage Meetup

item.name: Back to YOU - SoulCollage Workshop
